author: costin
msg: Started work on session testing code.
This ( when ready ) will extract the cookie and associate it with an
id, and allow us to automate session testing ( and do few other cool tricks).

author: costin
msg: Added 2 pages and a tag to display informations about sessions.
This was done to debug one of the bugs and to better monitor
what was happening. You can see all active sessions for a context
and invalidate individual sessions.
( of course, this is just better than nothing, a bit of HTML-formating
and more details would be even better )

author: marcsaeg
msg: Fixing missing type for NO_SESSION_FACADE.

author: hgomez
msg: Fix BUG #1006, by adding socket timeout
Default is 300s (5mn) but you could configure it in server.xml
timeout attribute (in second).

author: larryi
msg: Now that the session facade is 1-1 associated with the real session, we
can use that facade when calling valueUnbound() rather than using a
temporary one.  This patch undoes the last patch since it is no longer
needed.
